root: ^You have found a safespace, no harm can come to you here.

hone: ^The dangers of this world will only grow stronger, so you decided to train yourself and be much prepared for incoming danger.
rest: ^Taking advantage of the safespace, you decided to take a rest to recover your strength, your journey is still far ahead after all.
Pray: ^You get on your knees and started praying, you wish to be given enough strength to survive this ordeal.
^You start to feel more hopeful and confident and as you finish praying you notice the lantern starts to grow brighter.
